sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../Components/components.css' import projectData from '../Data/projects.json' export const Projects = (props) => { return(
Projects
{projectData.map(project => (
{project.title} ({project.year})
{project.people.map((person, index) => {person} {index < project.people.length - 1 ? ', ' : ''} )}
{project.description}
))}
) }
